verses.verse: For <S%H6726>Zion<s%>'s sake will I not hold my <S%H2814>peace<s%>, and for <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>'s sake I will not <S%H8252>rest<s%>, until the <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> there go <S%H3318>forth<s%> as <S%H5051>brightness<s%>, and the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> there as a <S%H3940>lamp<s%> that <S%H1197>burns<s%>.

And the <S%H1471>Nations<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and all <S%H4428>kings<s%> your <S%H3519>glory<s%>: and you shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> by a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5344>name<s%>, which the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H8034>name<s%>.

You shall also be a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>glory<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and a <S%H4410>royal<s%> <S%H6797>diadem<s%> in the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%>.

You shall no more be <S%H559>termed<s%> <S%H5800>Forsaken<s%>; neither shall your <S%H776>land<s%> any more be <S%H559>termed<s%> <S%H8077>Desolate<s%>: but you shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2657>Hephzi<s%>â€“bah, and your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1166>Beulah<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2654>delights<s%> in <S%H776>you<s%>, and your land shall be <S%H1166>married<s%>.

For as a young <S%H970>man<s%> <S%H1166>marries<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin<s%>, so shall your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1166>marry<s%> <S%H2860>you<s%>: and as the bridegroom <S%H4885>rejoices<s%> over the <S%H3618>bride<s%>, so shall your <S%H430>God<s%> rejoice over <S%H7797>you<s%>.

I have <S%H6485>set<s%> <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> upon your <S%H2346>walls<s%>, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, which shall <S%H8548>never<s%> hold their <S%H2814>peace<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> nor <S%H3915>night<s%>: you that make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, keep not <S%H1824>silence<s%>,
And <S%H5414>give<s%> him no <S%H1824>rest<s%>, until he <S%H3559>establish<s%>, and until he <S%H7760>makes<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by his right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and by the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of his <S%H5797>strength<s%>, Surely I <S%H518>will<s%> no more <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1715>corn<s%> to be <S%H3978>food<s%> for your <S%H341>enemies<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5236>stranger<s%> shall not <S%H8354>drink<s%> your <S%H8492>wine<s%>, for the which you have <S%H3021>labored<s%>:

But they that have <S%H622>gathered<s%> it shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1984>it<s%>, and praise the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and they that have brought it <S%H6908>together<s%> shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> it in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of my <S%H6944>holiness<s%>.

Go <S%H5674>through<s%>, go <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%>; <S%H6437>prepare<s%> you the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>; cast <S%H5549>up<s%>, cast <S%H5549>up<s%> the <S%H4546>highway<s%>; gather <S%H5619>out<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%>; lift <S%H7311>up<s%> a <S%H5251>standard<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

<S%H3068>Behold<s%>, the Lord has <S%H8085>proclaimed<s%> unto the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>world<s%>, <S%H559>Say<s%> you to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, <S%H3468>Behold<s%>, your salvation <S%H935>comes<s%>; <S%H7939>behold<s%>, his reward is with <S%H6468>him<s%>, and his work before <S%H6440>him<s%>.

And they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H6944>them<s%>, The holy <S%H5971>people<s%>, The <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and you shall be <S%H7121>called<s%>, Sought <S%H1875>out<s%>, A <S%H5892>city<s%> not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%>.
